thread.title: Remo D'Souza to feature on celebrity chat show
thread.title_full: Remo D'Souza to feature on celebrity chat show - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Remo D'Souza to feature on celebrity chat show
text:
Actor-comedian Gaurav Gera, who is now hosting a celebrity chat show called 'Chutki Shopkeepaa aur Woh', will have choreographer Remo D'Souza in its next episode, which will air on 9th October.
Airing on BIG Magic TV channel, the show will have the 'ABCD 2' director talking about his family background and current projects, read a statement.
READ: When Remo D'Souza was caught by security guards
Besides talking about his current projects, family background and his remarkable journey in Bollywood and dance, the choreographer will also be seen shaking a leg on the chat show.
'Chutki Shopkeepaa aur Woh' has had celebrities like Manish Paul and cast of 'Wedding Pulav' on the show.
